attributes.action: Repeal the Wearing of Face Coverings in a Relevant Place (England)
attributes.additional_details: The science that has been used to enact this legislation is weak at best. It is not evidence based and not proportional to the current level of risk. The use of face coverings promotes fear amongst the population, reduces communication and is in contravention of peoples' human rights.
attributes.background: Repeal the The Health Protection (Coronavirus, Wearing of Face Coverings in a Relevant Place) (England) Regulations 2020.
